name: Now Screening
description:
NOW SCREENING! is a platformer that aims to teach audiences about the harmful consequences that media misrepresentations can have on the autistic community.

Join Henry in a dialogue-rich narrative that seeks to show how difficult misrepresentations can be. Jump your way through a skatepark and a city metropolis as you discover Henry's life, and the ways that he interacts with the world around him.

(DISCLAIMER: THE FOLLOWING GAME IS FOR EDUCATIONAL AND INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES. IT IS NOT INTENDED AS A SUBSTITUTE FOR PROFESSIONAL ADVICE OR OPINIONS.THE EXPERIENCE IS INTENDED TO SHOW THE DANGERS OF MISPORTRAYALS OF AUTISM IN THE MEDIA INDUSTRY.NOW SCREENING!DOES NOT NECESSARILY REFLECT OR REPRESENT THE VIEWS AND OPINIONS OF THE AUTISTIC COMMUNITY,AND DOES NOT CLAIM TO UNDERSTAND THE LIVED EXPERIENCE OF AUTISTIC PEOPLE.)
